name: Send Vonage SMS messages from new Google Sheets rows
description: Make will watch for new rows in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and send Vonage SMS messages to the specified number. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1T8VpNVyy_4YEj9f7C3vFg3ZHE-vM5pcEQOX0e6P__Nc/edit?usp=sharing).
